articles.title: Alex Cora provides injury update for Wilyer Abreu, doesn’t give timetable for return
articles.description:
Abreu still has a ways to go before returning, but made some progress on Friday and Saturday according to Cora.

The post Alex Cora provides injury update for Wilyer Abreu, doesn’t give timetable for return appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Wilyer Abreu is making progress in recovery, according to Red Sox manager Alex Cora.
Cora did not provide a specific timetable for Abreu's return to the lineup.
Abreu's absence affects the Red Sox's performance as they compete for playoff positioning.
